---
id: Query_historical_orders
title: Query Historical 订单s
sidebar_label: Query Historical 订单s
sidebar_position: 9
description: /spot/v4/history-order
---

**类型:** GET

**描述:** `/spot/v4/history-order`

#### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

### 参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必需 | 默认值值 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `symbol` | 字符串 | No |  | Trading pair, if not filled in, represents all |
| `biz类型` | 字符串 | No |  | SPOT, LEVER |
| `side` | 字符串 | No |  | BUY, SELL |
| `type` | 字符串 | No |  | LIMIT, MARKET |
| `state` | 字符串 | No |  | 订单 [state](#orderStatus), PARTIALLY_FILLED, FILLED, CANCELED, REJECTED, EXPIRED |
| `fromId` | 数字 | No |  | Start ID |
| `direction` | 字符串 | No |  | Query direction: PREV, NEXT |
| `limit` | 数字 | No | 20 | Limit 数字, max 100 |
| `startTime` | 数字 | No |  | 示例: 1657682804112 |
| `endTime` | 数字 | No |  | End time |

#### orderStatus

| Status | 描述 |
| --- | --- |
| PARTIALLY_FILLED | 部分成交 |
| FILLED | 完全成交 |
| CANCELED | 已取消 |
| REJECTED | 已拒绝 |
| EXPIRED | 已过期 |
| `hiddenCanceled` | 布尔值 | No |  | Whether to hide canceled orders |

### 响应示例

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "字符串",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "hasPrev": 是,
    "hasNext": 是,
    "items": [
      {
        "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
        "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
        "client订单Id": "16559590087220001",
        "base货币": "字符串",
        "quote货币": "字符串",
        "side": "BUY",
        "type": "LIMIT",
        "timeInForce": "GTC",
        "price": "40000",
        "origQty": "2",
        "origQuoteQty": "48000",
        "executedQty": "1.2",
        "leavingQty": "字符串",
        "tradeBase": "2",
        "tradeQuote": "48000",
        "avgPrice": "42350",
        "fee": "字符串",
        "fee货币": "字符串",
        "state": "NEW",
        "time": 1655958915583,
        "updatedTime": 1655958915583
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
